isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 5 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER ES65-5 - REASSEMBLY - SHIFTER HOUSING

step1.para: Install a lockout plunger in the 1st-reverse shift bracket ( Figure 60). Lubricate the 1st-reverse rail, then slide part way into housing. Align bracket with rail, then slide rail through bracket and remaining bosses. Install fork and both set screws. Tighten to 40 to 50 ft-lbs. (54 to 68 N•m). With 1st-reverse in neutral (all rails are loose until poppet balls and springs are installed and shift tower is assembled), install 2nd-3rd interlock balls, which will seat into position.

figure.caption: Figure 60. Install Lockout Plunger in 1st-Reverse Shift Bracket

step1.para: Lubricate 2nd-3rd rail and slide part way into housing ( Figure 61). Install interlock pin and hold in place with heavy grease. Align fork with rail and slide rail into boss until in detent position. Install set screw and tighten to 40 to 50 ft-lbs. (54 to 68 N•m).

figure.caption: Figure 61. Slide 2nd-3rd Rail Part Way into Housing

step1.para: With 2nd-3rd rail in neutral position, install the interlock balls in the crosshole of the 4th-5th shift rail boss ( Figure 62). Seat the interlock pin and balls in the neutral notch of the 2nd-3rd rail. Slide the 4th-5th rail into position and install the fork and set screw. Tighten to 40 to 50 ft-lbs. (54 to 68 N•m). Install 1st or reverse lockout plunger, spring and retainer. Check the movement of each rail for proper operation.
Install the three welch plugs into the shift rail openings at the front of the housing ( Figure 63). Install the three poppet balls and springs in the top of the housing.

figure.caption: Figure 63. Install Welch Plugs into Shift Rail Openings
